Monoliths have been popping up in various places this year.
And now, one has appeared to celebrate the holidays.
This monolith appeared in San Francisco and it's made entirely out of gingerbread.
You can see it's several feet tall and decorated with icing and candy.
Visitors stop by to get a glimpse of the sculpture...
...and take in the sweet gingerbread smell.
I love the smell of gingerbread.
